00063 "inline bool b3IsAlmostZero(b3Float4ConstArg v)\n"
00064 "{\n"
00065 "       if(b3Fabs(v.x)>1e-6 || b3Fabs(v.y)>1e-6 || b3Fabs(v.z)>1e-6)    \n"
00066 "               return false;\n"
00067 "       return true;\n"
00068 "}\n"
00069 "inline int    b3MaxDot( b3Float4ConstArg vec, __global const b3Float4* vecArray, int vecLen, float* dotOut )\n"
00070 "{\n"
00071 "    float maxDot = -B3_INFINITY;\n"
00072 "    int i = 0;\n"
00073 "    int ptIndex = -1;\n"
00074 "    for( i = 0; i < vecLen; i++ )\n"
00075 "    {\n"
00076 "        float dot = b3Dot3F4(vecArray[i],vec);\n"
00077 "            \n"
00078 "        if( dot > maxDot )\n"
00079 "        {\n"
00080 "            maxDot = dot;\n"
00081 "            ptIndex = i;\n"
00082 "        }\n"
00083 "    }\n"
00084 "       b3Assert(ptIndex>=0);\n"
00085 "    if (ptIndex<0)\n"
00086 "       {\n"
00087 "               ptIndex = 0;\n"
00088 "       }\n"
00089 "    *dotOut = maxDot;\n"
00090 "    return ptIndex;\n"
00091 "}\n"

00194 "}\n"
00195 "__inline\n"
00196 "float4 cross3(float4 a, float4 b)\n"
00197 "{\n"
00198 "       return cross(a,b);\n"
00199 "}\n"
00200 "__inline\n"
00201 "float dot3F4(float4 a, float4 b)\n"
00202 "{\n"
00203 "       float4 a1 = make_float4(a.xyz,0.f);\n"
00204 "       float4 b1 = make_float4(b.xyz,0.f);\n"
00205 "       return dot(a1, b1);\n"
00206 "}\n"
00207 "__inline\n"
00208 "float length3(const float4 a)\n"
00209 "{\n"
00210 "       return sqrtf(dot3F4(a,a));\n"
00211 "}\n"
00212 "__inline\n"
00213 "float dot4(const float4 a, const float4 b)\n"
00214 "{\n"
00215 "       return dot( a, b );\n"
00216 "}\n"
00217 "//     for height\n"
00218 "__inline\n"
00219 "float dot3w1(const float4 point, const float4 eqn)\n"
00220 "{\n"
00221 "       return dot3F4(point,eqn) + eqn.w;\n"
00222 "}\n"
00223 "__inline\n"
00224 "float4 normalize3(const float4 a)\n"
00225 "{\n"
00226 "       float4 n = make_float4(a.x, a.y, a.z, 0.f);\n"
00227 "       return fastNormalize4( n );\n"
00228 "//     float length = sqrtf(dot3F4(a, a));\n"
00229 "//     return 1.f/length * a;\n"
00230 "}\n"
00231 "__inline\n"
00232 "float4 normalize4(const float4 a)\n"
00233 "{\n"
00234 "       float length = sqrtf(dot4(a, a));\n"
00235 "       return 1.f/length * a;\n"
00236 "}\n"
00237 "__inline\n"
00238 "float4 createEquation(const float4 a, const float4 b, const float4 c)\n"
00239 "{\n"
00240 "       float4 eqn;\n"
00241 "       float4 ab = b-a;\n"
00242 "       float4 ac = c-a;\n"
00243 "       eqn = normalize3( cross3(ab, ac) );\n"
00244 "       eqn.w = -dot3F4(eqn,a);\n"
00245 "       return eqn;\n"
00246 "}\n"
00247 "///////////////////////////////////////\n"
00248 "//     Matrix3x3\n"
00249 "///////////////////////////////////////\n"
00250 "typedef struct\n"
00251 "{\n"
00252 "       float4 m_row[3];\n"
00253 "}Matrix3x3;\n"
00254 "__inline\n"
00255 "Matrix3x3 mtZero();\n"
00256 "__inline\n"
00257 "Matrix3x3 mtIdentity();\n"
00258 "__inline\n"
00259 "Matrix3x3 mtTranspose(Matrix3x3 m);\n"
00260 "__inline\n"
00261 "Matrix3x3 mtMul(Matrix3x3 a, Matrix3x3 b);\n"
00262 "__inline\n"
00263 "float4 mtMul1(Matrix3x3 a, float4 b);\n"
00264 "__inline\n"
00265 "float4 mtMul3(float4 a, Matrix3x3 b);\n"
00266 "__inline\n"
00267 "Matrix3x3 mtZero()\n"
00268 "{\n"
00269 "       Matrix3x3 m;\n"
00270 "       m.m_row[0] = (float4)(0.f);\n"
00271 "       m.m_row[1] = (float4)(0.f);\n"
00272 "       m.m_row[2] = (float4)(0.f);\n"
00273 "       return m;\n"
00274 "}\n"
00275 "__inline\n"
00276 "Matrix3x3 mtIdentity()\n"
00277 "{\n"
00278 "       Matrix3x3 m;\n"
00279 "       m.m_row[0] = (float4)(1,0,0,0);\n"
00280 "       m.m_row[1] = (float4)(0,1,0,0);\n"
00281 "       m.m_row[2] = (float4)(0,0,1,0);\n"
00282 "       return m;\n"
00283 "}\n"
00284 "__inline\n"
00285 "Matrix3x3 mtTranspose(Matrix3x3 m)\n"
00286 "{\n"
00287 "       Matrix3x3 out;\n"
00288 "       out.m_row[0] = (float4)(m.m_row[0].x, m.m_row[1].x, m.m_row[2].x, 0.f);\n"
00289 "       out.m_row[1] = (float4)(m.m_row[0].y, m.m_row[1].y, m.m_row[2].y, 0.f);\n"
00290 "       out.m_row[2] = (float4)(m.m_row[0].z, m.m_row[1].z, m.m_row[2].z, 0.f);\n"
00291 "       return out;\n"
00292 "}\n"
00293 "__inline\n"
00294 "Matrix3x3 mtMul(Matrix3x3 a, Matrix3x3 b)\n"
00295 "{\n"
00296 "       Matrix3x3 transB;\n"
00297 "       transB = mtTranspose( b );\n"
00298 "       Matrix3x3 ans;\n"
00299 "       //      why this doesn't run when 0ing in the for{}\n"
00300 "       a.m_row[0].w = 0.f;\n"
00301 "       a.m_row[1].w = 0.f;\n"
00302 "       a.m_row[2].w = 0.f;\n"
00303 "       for(int i=0; i<3; i++)\n"
00304 "       {\n"
00305 "//     a.m_row[i].w = 0.f;\n"
00306 "               ans.m_row[i].x = dot3F4(a.m_row[i],transB.m_row[0]);\n"
00307 "               ans.m_row[i].y = dot3F4(a.m_row[i],transB.m_row[1]);\n"
00308 "               ans.m_row[i].z = dot3F4(a.m_row[i],transB.m_row[2]);\n"
00309 "               ans.m_row[i].w = 0.f;\n"
00310 "       }\n"
00311 "       return ans;\n"
00312 "}\n"
00313 "__inline\n"
00314 "float4 mtMul1(Matrix3x3 a, float4 b)\n"
00315 "{\n"
00316 "       float4 ans;\n"
00317 "       ans.x = dot3F4( a.m_row[0], b );\n"
00318 "       ans.y = dot3F4( a.m_row[1], b );\n"
00319 "       ans.z = dot3F4( a.m_row[2], b );\n"
00320 "       ans.w = 0.f;\n"
00321 "       return ans;\n"
00322 "}\n"
00323 "__inline\n"
00324 "float4 mtMul3(float4 a, Matrix3x3 b)\n"
00325 "{\n"
00326 "       float4 colx = make_float4(b.m_row[0].x, b.m_row[1].x, b.m_row[2].x, 0);\n"
00327 "       float4 coly = make_float4(b.m_row[0].y, b.m_row[1].y, b.m_row[2].y, 0);\n"
00328 "       float4 colz = make_float4(b.m_row[0].z, b.m_row[1].z, b.m_row[2].z, 0);\n"
00329 "       float4 ans;\n"
00330 "       ans.x = dot3F4( a, colx );\n"
00331 "       ans.y = dot3F4( a, coly );\n"
00332 "       ans.z = dot3F4( a, colz );\n"
00333 "       return ans;\n"
00334 "}\n"
00335 "///////////////////////////////////////\n"
00336 "//     Quaternion\n"
00337 "///////////////////////////////////////\n"
00338 "typedef float4 Quaternion;\n"
00339 "__inline\n"
00340 "Quaternion qtMul(Quaternion a, Quaternion b);\n"
00341 "__inline\n"
00342 "Quaternion qtNormalize(Quaternion in);\n"
00343 "__inline\n"
00344 "float4 qtRotate(Quaternion q, float4 vec);\n"
00345 "__inline\n"
00346 "Quaternion qtInvert(Quaternion q);\n"
00347 "__inline\n"
00348 "Quaternion qtMul(Quaternion a, Quaternion b)\n"
00349 "{\n"
00350 "       Quaternion ans;\n"
00351 "       ans = cross3( a, b );\n"
00352 "       ans += a.w*b+b.w*a;\n"
00353 "//     ans.w = a.w*b.w - (a.x*b.x+a.y*b.y+a.z*b.z);\n"
00354 "       ans.w = a.w*b.w - dot3F4(a, b);\n"
00355 "       return ans;\n"
00356 "}\n"
00357 "__inline\n"
00358 "Quaternion qtNormalize(Quaternion in)\n"
00359 "{\n"
00360 "       return fastNormalize4(in);\n"
00361 "//     in /= length( in );\n"
00362 "//     return in;\n"
00363 "}\n"
00364 "__inline\n"
00365 "float4 qtRotate(Quaternion q, float4 vec)\n"
00366 "{\n"
00367 "       Quaternion qInv = qtInvert( q );\n"
00368 "       float4 vcpy = vec;\n"
00369 "       vcpy.w = 0.f;\n"
00370 "       float4 out = qtMul(qtMul(q,vcpy),qInv);\n"
00371 "       return out;\n"
00372 "}\n"
00373 "__inline\n"
00374 "Quaternion qtInvert(Quaternion q)\n"
00375 "{\n"
00376 "       return (Quaternion)(-q.xyz, q.w);\n"
00377 "}\n"
00378 "__inline\n"
00379 "float4 qtInvRotate(const Quaternion q, float4 vec)\n"
00380 "{\n"
00381 "       return qtRotate( qtInvert( q ), vec );\n"
00382 "}\n"

00443 "//     others\n"
00444 "__kernel\n"
00445 "__attribute__((reqd_work_group_size(WG_SIZE,1,1)))\n"
00446 "void ReorderContactKernel(__global struct b3Contact4Data* in, __global struct b3Contact4Data* out, __global int2* sortData, int4 cb )\n"
00447 "{\n"
00448 "       int nContacts = cb.x;\n"
00449 "       int gIdx = GET_GLOBAL_IDX;\n"
00450 "       if( gIdx < nContacts )\n"
00451 "       {\n"
00452 "               int srcIdx = sortData[gIdx].y;\n"
00453 "               out[gIdx] = in[srcIdx];\n"
00454 "       }\n"
00455 "}\n"
00456 "__kernel __attribute__((reqd_work_group_size(WG_SIZE,1,1)))\n"
00457 "void SetDeterminismSortDataChildShapeB(__global struct b3Contact4Data* contactsIn, __global int2* sortDataOut, int nContacts)\n"
00458 "{\n"
00459 "       int gIdx = GET_GLOBAL_IDX;\n"
00460 "       if( gIdx < nContacts )\n"
00461 "       {\n"
00462 "               int2 sd;\n"
00463 "               sd.x = contactsIn[gIdx].m_childIndexB;\n"
00464 "               sd.y = gIdx;\n"
00465 "               sortDataOut[gIdx] = sd;\n"
00466 "       }\n"
00467 "}\n"
00468 "__kernel __attribute__((reqd_work_group_size(WG_SIZE,1,1)))\n"
00469 "void SetDeterminismSortDataChildShapeA(__global struct b3Contact4Data* contactsIn, __global int2* sortDataInOut, int nContacts)\n"
00470 "{\n"
00471 "       int gIdx = GET_GLOBAL_IDX;\n"
00472 "       if( gIdx < nContacts )\n"
00473 "       {\n"
00474 "               int2 sdIn;\n"
00475 "               sdIn = sortDataInOut[gIdx];\n"
00476 "               int2 sdOut;\n"
00477 "               sdOut.x = contactsIn[sdIn.y].m_childIndexA;\n"
00478 "               sdOut.y = sdIn.y;\n"
00479 "               sortDataInOut[gIdx] = sdOut;\n"
00480 "       }\n"
00481 "}\n"
00482 "__kernel __attribute__((reqd_work_group_size(WG_SIZE,1,1)))\n"
00483 "void SetDeterminismSortDataBodyA(__global struct b3Contact4Data* contactsIn, __global int2* sortDataInOut, int nContacts)\n"
00484 "{\n"
00485 "       int gIdx = GET_GLOBAL_IDX;\n"
00486 "       if( gIdx < nContacts )\n"
00487 "       {\n"
00488 "               int2 sdIn;\n"
00489 "               sdIn = sortDataInOut[gIdx];\n"
00490 "               int2 sdOut;\n"
00491 "               sdOut.x = contactsIn[sdIn.y].m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit;\n"
00492 "               sdOut.y = sdIn.y;\n"
00493 "               sortDataInOut[gIdx] = sdOut;\n"
00494 "       }\n"
00495 "}\n"
00496 "__kernel\n"
00497 "__attribute__((reqd_work_group_size(WG_SIZE,1,1)))\n"
00498 "void SetDeterminismSortDataBodyB(__global struct b3Contact4Data* contactsIn, __global int2* sortDataInOut, int nContacts)\n"
00499 "{\n"
00500 "       int gIdx = GET_GLOBAL_IDX;\n"
00501 "       if( gIdx < nContacts )\n"
00502 "       {\n"
00503 "               int2 sdIn;\n"
00504 "               sdIn = sortDataInOut[gIdx];\n"
00505 "               int2 sdOut;\n"
00506 "               sdOut.x = contactsIn[sdIn.y].m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit;\n"
00507 "               sdOut.y = sdIn.y;\n"
00508 "               sortDataInOut[gIdx] = sdOut;\n"
00509 "       }\n"
00510 "}\n"
00511 "typedef struct\n"
00512 "{\n"
00513 "       int m_nContacts;\n"
00514 "       int m_staticIdx;\n"
00515 "       float m_scale;\n"
00516 "       int m_nSplit;\n"
00517 "} ConstBufferSSD;\n"
00518 "__constant const int gridTable4x4[] = \n"
00519 "{\n"
00520 "    0,1,17,16,\n"
00521 "       1,2,18,19,\n"
00522 "       17,18,32,3,\n"
00523 "       16,19,3,34\n"
00524 "};\n"
00525 "__constant const int gridTable8x8[] = \n"
00526 "{\n"
00527 "         0,  2,  3, 16, 17, 18, 19,  1,\n"
00528 "        66, 64, 80, 67, 82, 81, 65, 83,\n"
00529 "       131,144,128,130,147,129,145,146,\n"
00530 "       208,195,194,192,193,211,210,209,\n"
00531 "        21, 22, 23,  5,  4,  6,  7, 20,\n"
00532 "        86, 85, 69, 87, 70, 68, 84, 71,\n"
00533 "       151,133,149,150,135,148,132,134,\n"
00534 "       197,27,214,213,212,199,198,196\n"
00535 "       \n"
00536 "};\n"
00537 "#define USE_SPATIAL_BATCHING 1\n"
00538 "#define USE_4x4_GRID 1\n"
00539 "__kernel\n"
00540 "__attribute__((reqd_work_group_size(WG_SIZE,1,1)))\n"
00541 "void SetSortDataKernel(__global struct b3Contact4Data* gContact, __global Body* gBodies, __global int2* gSortDataOut, \n"
00542 "int nContacts,float scale,int4 nSplit,int staticIdx)\n"
00543 "{\n"
00544 "       int gIdx = GET_GLOBAL_IDX;\n"
00545 "       \n"
00546 "       if( gIdx < nContacts )\n"
00547 "       {\n"
00548 "               int aPtrAndSignBit  = gContact[gIdx].m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit;\n"
00549 "               int bPtrAndSignBit  = gContact[gIdx].m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit;\n"
00550 "               int aIdx = abs(aPtrAndSignBit );\n"
00551 "               int bIdx = abs(bPtrAndSignBit);\n"
00552 "               bool aStatic = (aPtrAndSignBit<0) ||(aPtrAndSignBit==staticIdx);\n"
00553 "               bool bStatic = (bPtrAndSignBit<0) ||(bPtrAndSignBit==staticIdx);\n"
00554 "#if USE_SPATIAL_BATCHING               \n"
00555 "               int idx = (aStatic)? bIdx: aIdx;\n"
00556 "               float4 p = gBodies[idx].m_pos;\n"
00557 "               int xIdx = (int)((p.x-((p.x<0.f)?1.f:0.f))*scale) & (nSplit.x-1);\n"
00558 "               int yIdx = (int)((p.y-((p.y<0.f)?1.f:0.f))*scale) & (nSplit.y-1);\n"
00559 "               int zIdx = (int)((p.z-((p.z<0.f)?1.f:0.f))*scale) & (nSplit.z-1);\n"
00560 "               int newIndex = (xIdx+yIdx*nSplit.x+zIdx*nSplit.x*nSplit.y);\n"
00561 "               \n"
00562 "#else//USE_SPATIAL_BATCHING\n"
00563 "       #if USE_4x4_GRID\n"
00564 "               int aa = aIdx&3;\n"
00565 "               int bb = bIdx&3;\n"
00566 "               if (aStatic)\n"
00567 "                       aa = bb;\n"
00568 "               if (bStatic)\n"
00569 "                       bb = aa;\n"
00570 "               int gridIndex = aa + bb*4;\n"
00571 "               int newIndex = gridTable4x4[gridIndex];\n"
00572 "       #else//USE_4x4_GRID\n"
00573 "               int aa = aIdx&7;\n"
00574 "               int bb = bIdx&7;\n"
00575 "               if (aStatic)\n"
00576 "                       aa = bb;\n"
00577 "               if (bStatic)\n"
00578 "                       bb = aa;\n"
00579 "               int gridIndex = aa + bb*8;\n"
00580 "               int newIndex = gridTable8x8[gridIndex];\n"
00581 "       #endif//USE_4x4_GRID\n"
00582 "#endif//USE_SPATIAL_BATCHING\n"
00583 "               gSortDataOut[gIdx].x = newIndex;\n"
00584 "               gSortDataOut[gIdx].y = gIdx;\n"
00585 "       }\n"
00586 "       else\n"
00587 "       {\n"
00588 "               gSortDataOut[gIdx].x = 0xffffffff;\n"
00589 "       }\n"
00590 "}\n"
00591 "__kernel\n"
00592 "__attribute__((reqd_work_group_size(WG_SIZE,1,1)))\n"
00593 "void CopyConstraintKernel(__global struct b3Contact4Data* gIn, __global struct b3Contact4Data* gOut, int4 cb )\n"
00594 "{\n"
00595 "       int gIdx = GET_GLOBAL_IDX;\n"
00596 "       if( gIdx < cb.x )\n"
00597 "       {\n"
00598 "               gOut[gIdx] = gIn[gIdx];\n"
00599 "       }\n"
00600 "}\n"
00601 ;
